cab.content: Military Secret. 1104. /Q Q From Viceroy, Army Depirlment, to Secretary of Slate for India,1 * \lth November 1919.- - - \ (Repealed to Constantinople and Vladivostock under Com-mander-in-Chief,LI, No. 77976.)(Received 18th.)15536. 17th November. Malleson telegraphs 1-lth November:......."Serbian and austrian lately arrived here from Tashkent state that in September BolshevicsJUv^ captured inl33 . and elsewhere thonsauds of new rifles of American make which had never been unpacked from their original factory cases, and also hundreds of machine guns of British make. Quantities of ammunition were also captured."
